docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 19 -- President Kennedy announced today that he would not attend the inter-American conference in Punta del. Estate, Uruguay, opening Aug. 5, which will take up his Alliance for Progress program.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 19 -- President Kennedy said today that Chester Bowles would remain as Under Secretary of State unless he could be used more effectively in another responsible position.

docs.snippet: An alliance of Latin-American airlines attacked yesterday a proposed United States air transport policy attributed to Senator George A. Smathers, Democrat of Florida. They contended that it was "actually a plan advanced by Pan American World Airways...
docs.lead_paragraph: An alliance of Latin-American airlines attacked yesterday a proposed United States air transport policy attributed to Senator George A. Smathers, Democrat of Florida. They contended that it was "actually a plan advanced by Pan American World Airways and its subsidiaries."
docs.abstract: Inter-Amer Air Transport Confed charges Sen Smathers seeks to further as US policy Pan Amer plan that would raise fares up to 40%

headline.main: PAN AM ASSAILED BY LATIN AIRLINES; Accused of Instigating Plan to Curb Rate Cutting

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 22 -- A long-standing project to establish a graduate University of the Americas for Latin-American students remains dormant despite the Administration's plans to aid higher education in the hemisphere.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July 22 -- Argentina has been looking ahead to the Alliance for Progress conference in Uruguay next month with a measure of skepticism, because she has had the impression that the United States was pursuing contradictory policies.

headline.main: ARGENTINA HOPES TO RAISE EXPORTS; Use of Credit Grants Seen Hinging on U.S. Policy
